mapper.insert:
insert into t_config_relation_data_item_set (dataSet, dataItem, isNotNull, isKey, isRequired) values
(#{item.dataSet,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dataItem,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isNotNull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isRequired,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
on duplicate key update del=0
mapper.update:
update t_config_relation_data_item_set set del=1 where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select t1.id, t1.dataSet, t1.dataItem, t1.isNotNull, t1.isKey, t1.isRequired, t1.createTime, t1.updateTime ,t2.dataItemName, t2.alias, t2.dataItem, t2.description, t2.dataType, t2.itemLength, t2.sourceDepartment, t2.sourceSystem, t2.contact, t2.mobileNum from t_config_relation_data_item_set t1 join t_config_data_item t2 on t1.dataSet=t2.dataSet and t1.dataSetId=#{params.dataSetId} where t1.del=0
and t2.dataItemName like CONCAT('%',#{params.dataItemName},'%')
and t2.sourceDepartment like CONCAT('%',#{params.sourceDepartment},'%')
and t2.sourceSystem like CONCAT('%',#{params.sourceSystem},'%')
